actions.name: Guard Down

cost.trigger: At the start of combat or when switched in.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat or when switched in.
Effect: All valid creatures in range lose -1 DEF stage for 5 activations. The user's Conversation Skill checks have an additional +10 bonus.
